metadata.title: CVE-2019-19814 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted f2fs filesystem image cancause __remove_dirty_segment slab-out-of-bounds write access because anarray is bounded by the number of dirty types (8) but the array index canexceed this.

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2020-01-09').
